title: Leap Year Checker
description: The Leap Year Checker is a simple web application built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3 that allows users to check whether a given year is a leap year or not.

title: BMI Calculator
description: This simple BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator is built using vanilla JavaScript and styled with Tailwind CSS.

title: Currency Converter
description: This Currency Converter project is a simple web application created using vanilla HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
